body.name: Linksys Hydra Pro 6 Mesh WiFi 6 Router - WiFi Extender Replacement - MR5500-AMZ - Mesh WiFi Router for Wireless Internet - WiFi Mesh Wireless Router - Mesh Router Connect to 30+ Devices 2,700 Sq Ft
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 52 mins
features: WIFI ROUTER FOR HIGH SPEED - Take work and play to the next level with higher speeds and wider coverage in every corner of your home. Equipped with Intelligent Mesh, this dual-band router delivers the true power of WiFi 6 technology
MAKE THE MOST OF YOUR WIFI CONNECTION - Access to higher bandwidth limits enables the true power of WiFi 6 technology, delivering the fastest connection with everything you do
MORE WIFI FOR MORE DEVICES - WiFi 6 sends and receives multiple streams of data simultaneously, providing up to 4x more WiFi capacity to handle more gaming, and smart home devices
POWERFUL MESH TECHNOLOGY - Future-ready hardware with Intelligent Mesh Technology and guaranteed updates keep your connection going strong
WIFI 6 ROUTER FOR THE HOME - Six-stream WiFi with up to 574 + 4804 Mbps for ultra-fast wireless speeds
body.description: Introducing the Linksys Mesh WiFi 6 Hydra Pro 6 - the ultimate solution to your home networking needs. This innovative device delivers lightning-fast internet speeds, seamless connectivity, and unmatched reliability, all in one sleek and stylish package. Linksys Hydra Pro 6 is powered by the latest WiFi 6 technology, so you'll experience blazing-fast internet speeds of up to 5.3 Gbps, making it perfect for streaming 4K videos, playing online games, and working from home without any lag or buffering. Mesh WiFi 6 technology ensures you'll have a strong and stable signal throughout your home. With the Hydra Pro 6, you can say goodbye to dead zones and weak connections. The device uses intelligent mesh technology to automatically optimize your network and provide you with the best possible performance. Setting up the Hydra Pro 6 MR5500 is quick and easy. Simply download the Linksys App and follow the step-by-step instructions. You'll be up and running in no time. The app allows you to manage your network, monitor internet usage, and control devices from anywhere. With its powerful WiFi coverage, you can blanket your entire home from the garage to the backyard guest house without needing a WiFi extender or WiFi booster. Comes with an Amazon exclusive extended 18 month warranty

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Coverage, Fast wireless
reviews.reviewText: This router is far better than the ancient Apple AirPort Extreme I finally was forced to replace. Fast all over the condo. Even in the back bedroom, the wireless signal is still 85% as fast as if you're sitting in front if it. The gig ethernet works great on the devices I have plugged in and it was very easy to configure using my phone.Zero problems and couldn't be more pleased with this thing. Spectrum, on the other hand, and their 1990s technology leaves a LOT to be desired but I'm stuck with them. Looking forward to moving this summer to a place that offers anything other than Spectrum's 20+ year old infrastructure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I needed some assistance with the set up. Customer service was fantastic. Big improvement from my old router. Trouble free so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does have a strong signal.
reviews.reviewText: Only thing I do not like about this extender. You can not go in manually and rest setting. Once it is locked into the main router. That's it no more settings. Linksys app is no help. And neither is tech support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This is a terrible router
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this router in January & initially it worked fine. About a month into owning it, it started not working. Not understanding what was happening, we unplugged it, waited, then re-booted it. It always came back to a functioning level. When this kept happening, we re-booted both the router & modem. Then we began calling our internet provider & working with them re. what was happening. We even had service calls @ our house from our internet provider. They provided a new modem, replaced some connections, verified that the signal was good from the pole to the modem. And then 2 days ago, the router completely stopped working. Again, I reached out to our internet provider, they checked everything again. The router could not be brought back to life. To say I'm disappointed would be an understatement. I did my research prior to purchasing & thought I'd bought a reliable product. Went back to Netgear today.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as advertised
reviews.reviewText: I had a Linksys EA6890 AC router for the last 6 years. For the most part, it did function well, but lately the signal to my Roku was not strong enough to prevent occasional freezing. Interference from my neighbors wifi was also contributing to this problem. I figured I needed just a little stronger wifi so I bought this router. It appears to have solved the problem and every device connected, even the N and AC devices, now have significantly faster connections. It is also a bit more of an intelligent system, able to analyze the wifi (by using the Linksys app) and picking the best frequency and channel automatically (my old router usually required me to decide which settings to use, which I had periodically change due to the neighbors wifi changing channels).Setting up did require multiple attempts to connect to the router using their app, but after a few reboots of the router and modem, I finally connected and the rest was fairly easy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this model instead of the pricier 4-antenna one after I discovered the other 2 antennas are only for the 6 GHz band. Our ISP configured it for us, we plugged it into our shiny new fiber internet interface box and it worked. We're only paying for 30+ Mbps service so router bandwidth is "who cares", and the wif-fi strength seems fine in our building where it matters. If it lasts, it's a success.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works great. Have had no issues and allows for all of our streaming and gaming.
